scripts.start: yarn run run && sleep 1 && yarn run deploy
scripts.run: yarn run kill && adb reverse tcp:3030 tcp:3030 && nohup react-native start >/vagrant/react-native.log 2>&1 </dev/null &
scripts.kill: watchman watch-del-all && if [ "$(pgrep -af '/vagrant/node_modules/.bin/react-native' | grep -v grep | cut -d" " -f1)" ]; then kill `pgrep -af '/vagrant/node_modules/.bin/react-native' | grep -v grep | cut -d" " -f1`; fi
